metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0934 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap use after free in dhcp6_no_relay

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0934` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.85-1ubuntu2.1
dnsmasq-base - 2.85-1ubuntu2.1
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.85-1ubuntu2.1
dnsmasq-utils - 2.85-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.85-1ubuntu2.1').
